data.name: Hell Blasters Arrange Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This Soundtrack contains the arranged soundtrack by Jasson Prestiliano (JP Soundworks), Scowsh and crisp. Provided as FLACs and high-quality MP3 files.

Tracklist:
  • 1. Character Select
  • 2. Stage 1
  • 3. Boss
  • 4. Stage 2
  • 5. Stage 3
  • 6. Stage 4
  • 7. Stage 5
  • 8. Final Boss
  • 9. Stage Clear

pc_requirements.minimum:
